content.text:
# 2022 Empire Women's Indoor 2 – Singles

Eva Lys
| runner   =  Anna Karolína Schmiedlová
| score    = 6–2, 4–6, 6–2
| type    = singles doubles
| main_name = Empire Women's Indoor
}}
Jaqueline Cristian was the defending champion but chose not to participate.
Eva Lys won the title, defeating Anna Karolína Schmiedlová in the final, 6–2, 4–6, 6–2.
Seeds
Linda Nosková (quarterfinals)
#  Anna Karolína Schmiedlová (final)
#  Daria Snigur (first round)
#  Vitalia Diatchenko (quarterfinals)
#  Katie Swan (withdrew)
#  Léolia Jeanjean (second round)
#  Caty McNally (semifinals)
#  Eva Lys (champion)
}}
